sqlMap.statements:
select * from his_robotcommand sequenceno=$sequenceno$ strcmd1=#strcmd1# starmno1=#starmno1# stgetposition1=$stgetposition1$ stputposition1=$stputposition1$ stgetslotno1=$stgetslotno1$ stputslotno1=$stputslotno1$ stsubcommand1=#stsubcommand1# stgetslotpostion1=$stgetslotpostion1$ stputslotpostion1=$stputslotpostion1$ ndrcmd2=#ndrcmd2# ndarmno2=#ndarmno2# ndgetposition2=$ndgetposition2$ ndputposition2=$ndputposition2$ ndgetslotno2=$ndgetslotno2$ ndputslotno2=$ndputslotno2$ ndsubcommand2=#ndsubcommand2# ndgetslotpostion2=$ndgetslotpostion2$ ndputslotpostion2=$ndputslotpostion2$ commandresult1=$commandresult1$ commandresult2=$commandresult2$ commandresult3=$commandresult3$ commandresult4=$commandresult4$ currentposition=$currentposition$ functionname=#functionname# createdate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp createdate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp
select * from his_vcr eqpid=#eqpid# unitid=#unitid# unitname=#unitname# vcrenablemode=$vcrenablemode$ vcrno=$vcrno$ vcrreadfailoperationmode=$vcrreadfailoperationmode$ createdate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp createdate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp
select * from his_port eqpid=#eqpid# unitid=#unitid# unitname=#unitname# portno=$portno$ portid=#portid# portstatus=$portstatus$ portmode=$portmode$ portcsttype=$portcsttype$ portoperationmode=$portoperationmode$ porttypeautochangemode=$porttypeautochangemode$ capacity=$capacity$ portqtime=$portqtime$ glasstype=$glasstype$ portgrade=#portgrade# portenablemode=$portenablemode$ userms=$userms$ updatedate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp updatedate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp isingetput=$isingetput$ productiontype=#productiontype# cassettesequenceno=$cassettesequenceno$ cassetteid=#cassetteid# porttype=#porttype# transfermode=#transfermode# portpausemode=#portpausemode# portusetype=#portusetype# functionname=#functionname#
order by updatedate desc
limit $limitcount$ offset $limitpage$*$limitcount$
select portid from his_port eqpid=#eqpid# unitid=#unitid# unitname=#unitname# portno=$portno$ portid=#portid# portstatus=$portstatus$ portmode=$portmode$ portcsttype=$portcsttype$ portoperationmode=$portoperationmode$ porttypeautochangemode=$porttypeautochangemode$ capacity=$capacity$ portqtime=$portqtime$ glasstype=$glasstype$ portgrade=#portgrade# portenablemode=$portenablemode$ userms=$userms$ updatedate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp updatedate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp isingetput=$isingetput$ productiontype=#productiontype# cassettesequenceno=$cassettesequenceno$ cassetteid=#cassetteid# porttype=#porttype# transfermode=#transfermode# portpausemode=#portpausemode# portusetype=#portusetype# functionname=#functionname#
order by updatedate desc

eqpid=#eqpid#
unitid=#unitid#
alarmid=#alarmid#
select * from his_opilog userid like '%' || #userid# || '%' operating like '%' || #operating# || '%' operationresult=#operationresult# clientip=#clientip# createtime=#createtime# createtime >= #firstdate#::timestamp createtime <= #lastdate#::timestamp
order by createtime desc
limit $limitcount$ offset $limitpage$*$limitcount$
select userid from his_opilog userid like '%' || #userid# || '%' operating like '%' || #operating# || '%' operationresult=#operationresult# clientip=#clientip# createtime=#createtime# createtime >= #firstdate#::timestamp createtime <= #lastdate#::timestamp
order by createtime desc
INSERT INTO his_opilog( userid, operating,operationresult,clientip,createtime) VALUES (#userid#,#operating#, #operationresult#,#clientip#,localtimestamp(0))
select * from wip_cassette eqpid=#eqpid# unitid=#unitid# unitname=#unitname# portno=$portno$ portid=#portid# cassettesequenceno=$cassettesequenceno$ cassettestatus=$cassettestatus$ porttype=$porttype$ portstatus=$portstatus$ cassetteid=#cassetteid# lotname=#lotname# processflowname=#processflowname# processflowversion=#processflowversion# processoperationname=#processoperationname# processoperationversion=#processoperationversion# portusetype=#portusetype# productspecname=#productspecname# productspecversion=#productspecversion# productiontype=#productiontype# productquantity=$productquantity$ slotmap=#slotmap# slotsel=#slotsel# machinerecipename=#machinerecipename# workorder=#workorder# lotjudge=#lotjudge# cassetteprocessendtime >= #cassetteprocessendtime#::timestamp cassetteprocessstarttime >= #cassetteprocessstarttime#::timestamp updatedate >= #updatedate#::timestamp qtimeflag=$qtimeflag$ cassettecode=#cassettecode# jobexistenceslot=#jobexistenceslot# carriertype=#carriertype# compeletedcassettedata=$compeletedcassettedata$ id=#id#
select * from cfg_operationmode eqpid=#eqpid# equipmentvalue=$equipmentvalue$ operationmodename=#operationmodename# updateuser=#updateuser#
order by equipmentvalue asc
select * from bc_group
object_id=$object_id$
group_id=#group_id#
description=#description#
create_time=#create_time#
create_user=#create_user#
update_user=#update_user#
update_time=#update_time#
INSERT INTO bc_group(object_id,group_id, description, create_time, create_user) VALUES ((select max(object_id)+1 from bc_group),#group_id#, #description#, localtimestamp(0), #create_user#);
INSERT INTO bc_group_authority(group_id,menu_name, page_name, action) VALUES (#groupId#,#menuName#, #pageName#, #action#);
select * from bc_group_authority where group_id=(select groupid from his_user where userid=#value# LIMIT 1)
select * from bc_group_authority where group_id=#value#
DELETE FROM bc_group WHERE group_id=#value#; DELETE FROM bc_group_authority WHERE group_id=#value#; DELETE FROM his_user WHERE groupid=#value#;
DELETE FROM bc_group WHERE group_id=#value#; DELETE FROM bc_group_authority WHERE group_id=#value#;
SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables where schemaname='public';
SELECT a.attnum AS majorKey, a.attname AS propertyName, t.typname AS pType, a.attlen AS pLength, a.atttypmod AS pPoint, a.attnotnull AS isNull, b.description AS description FROM pg_class c, pg_attribute a LEFT OUTER JOIN pg_description b ON a.attrelid=b.objoid AND a.attnum = b.objsubid, pg_type t WHERE c.relname = #value# and a.attnum > 0 and a.attrelid = c.oid and a.atttypid = t.oid ORDER BY a.attnum;
select * from bc_group_authority
group_id=#group_id#
menu_name=#menu_name#
page_name=#page_name#
action=#action#

idx_name=#idx_name#
robot_name=#robot_name#
log_name=#log_name#
log_path=#log_path#
line_name=#line_name#

idx_name=#idx_name#
group_name=#group_name#
group_list=#group_list#
group_method=$group_method$
line_name=#line_name#
select DISTINCT $returnstr$ as returnstr from $value$

select * from wip_glassinfo productid=#productid# operationid=#operationid# lotid=#lotid# ppid1=#ppid1# ppid2=#ppid2# ppid3=#ppid3# ppid4=#ppid4# ppid5=#ppid5# ppid6=#ppid6# ppid7=#ppid7# ppid8=#ppid8# ppid9=#ppid9# ppid10=#ppid10# glassid=#glassid# cassettesequenceno=$cassettesequenceno$ slotsequenceno=$slotsequenceno$ slotposition=$slotposition$ cuttingsequenceno=$cuttingsequenceno$ glassjudgecode=#glassjudgecode# glassgradecode=#glassgradecode# processingflag=#processingflag# glasssizecode=#glasssizecode# glassthicknesscode=#glassthicknesscode# glasstype=#glasstype# lotcode=#lotcode# processingcount=#processingcount# inspectionflag=#inspectionflag# skipflag=#skipflag# inlineeqdata=#inlineeqdata# workorder=#workorder# processflowname=#processflowname# processflowversion=#processflowversion# processoperationversion=#processoperationversion# productspecversion=#productspecversion# productiontype=#productiontype# halfproductjudge=#halfproductjudge# glassmaker=#glassmaker# productrecipe=#productrecipe# reworktype=#reworktype# reworkcount=#reworkcount# samplingflag=#samplingflag# exposurerecipename=#exposurerecipename# turndegree=#turndegree# flowmodevalue=#flowmodevalue# evaskipflag=#evaskipflag# beforeprocessmachine=#beforeprocessmachine# producttype=#producttype# maskspecname=#maskspecname# processflowrunstate=#processflowrunstate# position=$position$ processinginfo=#processinginfo# vcrproductname=#vcrproductname# nginputcomment=#nginputcomment# panelgrade=#panelgrade# paneljudge=#paneljudge# updatedate >= #updatedate#::timestamp modelposition=$modelposition$ currentunit=#currentunit# productalarm=$productalarm$ rglassid=#rglassid# slotsatus=$slotsatus$ fetchdatetime >= #fetchdatetime#::timestamp portid=#portid# cassetteid=#cassetteid# currentsunit=#currentsunit# currentssunit=#currentssunit# currentslotno=$currentslotno$ createdate >= #createdate#::timestamp enddate >= #enddate#::timestamp begindate >= #begindate#::timestamp modepath=#modepath#
order by id desc
select * from his_user username=#username# userid=#userid# password=#password# level=#level# creator=#creator# createdate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp createdate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp groupid=#groupid#
select * from bc_user_group group_id=#group_id# group_name=#group_name# user_count=#user_count# depart=#depart# comments=#comments# user_id=#user_id#
select * from wip_alarm eqpid=#eqpid# alarmstatus=#alarmstatus# alarmtext=#alarmtext# createdate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp createdate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp unitid=#unitid# alarmtype=#alarmtype# alarmid=#alarmid# alarmunitnumber=#alarmunitnumber# alarmcode=#alarmcode#
select * from bc_eqp_command_conf object_id=$object_id$ line_id=#line_id# equipment_no=#equipment_no# equipment_id=#equipment_id# subequipment_no=#subequipment_no# machine=#machine# command_type=#command_type# protocol=#protocol# command_secsname=#command_secsname# command_to_map=#command_to_map#
select * from bc_eqp_command_para object_id=$object_id$ command_type=#command_type# parameter_id=#parameter_id# parameter_type=#parameter_type# required=$required$ reference_value=#reference_value# max_value=#max_value#::float4 min_value=#min_value#::float4 line_id=#line_id# parameter_name=#parameter_name# item_number=#item_number# equipment_no=#equipment_no#
select * from his_material eqpid=#eqpid# createdate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp createdate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp unitid=#unitid# materialtype=#materialtype# materialid like '%' || #materialid# || '%' materialstate=#materialstate# materialusedcnt=#materialusedcnt# materialposition=#materialposition#
order by createdate desc
limit $limitcount$ offset $limitpage$*$limitcount$
select materialid from his_material eqpid=#eqpid# createdate >= #startcreatedate#::timestamp createdate <= #endcreatedate#::timestamp unitid=#unitid# materialtype=#materialtype# materialid like '%' || #materialid# || '%' materialstate=#materialstate# materialusedcnt=#materialusedcnt# materialposition=#materialposition#
order by createdate desc
DELETE FROM cfg_eqp WHERE eqpid=#value#
DELETE FROM cfg_port WHERE eqpid=#eqpid# and unitid=#unitid# and portid=#portid#
DELETE FROM cfg_unit WHERE unitid=#value#
DELETE FROM wip_glassinfo WHERE glassid=#value#
DELETE FROM cfg_recipeppidmap WHERE eqpid=#eqpid# and ppid=#ppid#
DELETE FROM cfg_processmodemap WHERE eqpid=#eqpid# and machinerecipename=#machinerecipename#
DELETE FROM wip_alarm WHERE eqpid=#eqpid# and unitid=#unitid# and alarmid=#alarmid# and id=$id$

currentsunit like '%' || #currentsunit# || '%'
portid=#portid#
cassetteid=#cassetteid#
select * from cfg_eqpstatusrule eqpid=#eqpid# unitidlist like '%' || #unitidlist# || '%' checkenable=$checkenable$ eqpstatus=#eqpstatus#
DELETE FROM cfg_eqpstatusrule WHERE eqpid=#eqpid# and eqpstatus=#eqpstatus# and unitidlist=#unitidlist#
DELETE FROM cfg_operationmode WHERE eqpid=#eqpid# and equipmentvalue=#equipmentvalue#
INSERT INTO cfg_operationmode( eqpid, equipmentvalue,operationmodename,updatetime,updateuser) VALUES (#eqpid#,$equipmentvalue$, #operationmodename#,localtimestamp(0),#updateuser#)
INSERT INTO cfg_eqpstatusrule( eqpid, unitidlist,checkenable,eqpstatus) VALUES (#eqpid#,#unitidlist#, true,#eqpstatus#)
INSERT INTO cfg_recipeppidmap( eqpid, ppid,recipeid,createuser,unitid,localid,createdate) VALUES (#eqpid#,#ppid#, #recipeid#,#createuser#,#unitid#,$localid$,localtimestamp(0)) s
INSERT INTO cfg_processmodemap( modepath,machinerecipename,eqpid,createdate,hascvd,remark) VALUES (#modepath#,#machinerecipename#,#eqpid#,localtimestamp(0),#hascvd#,#remark#)
update cfg_recipeppidmap set recipeid = $recipeid$ where eqpid=#eqpid# and unitid=#unitid# and ppid=#ppid#
update cfg_processmodemap set modepath = #modepath# ,hascvd = #hascvd# ,remark = #remark# where eqpid=#eqpid# and machinerecipename=#machinerecipename#
update cfg_eqp set robotdispatchmode = $robotdispatchmode$
eqpid=#eqpid#
update cfg_eqp set iscoldrun = $iscoldrun$
eqpid=#eqpid#
delete from wip_cassette
portid =#portid#
cassettesequenceno =#cassettesequenceno#

eqpid=#eqpid#
unitid=#unitid#
index=#index#
id=#id#
UPDATE public.cfg_svdata SET svname=#svName#, operationenable=#operationEnable#, operationsymbol=#operationSymbol#, operationproportion=$operationProportion$
eqpid=#eqpid#
unitid=#unitid#
index=#index#
id=#id#

eqpid=#eqpid#
unitid=#unitid#
index=#index#
select * from cfg_eqpstatusgroup eqpid=#eqpid# index=$index$ eqpstatus=#eqpstatus#
order by index asc
UPDATE public.cfg_eqpstatusgroup SET index=$index$
eqpid=#eqpid# and eqpstatus=#eqpstatus#

id=$id$

delete from cfg_mixrunconfig where id=$Value$

delete from his_opilog where id=$Value$
